metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11509 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An authenticated remote attacker can execute arbitrary code in Firebird SQL Server versions 2.5.7 and 3.0.2 by executing a malformed SQL statement.

notes.Note: msalvatore> "No official solution exists. However, Tenable believes that disabling external UDF libraries from being loaded mitigates this issue... edit the default configuration from UdfAccess=Restrict to UdfAccess=None." -- Marking as "ignored"

criterions.comment: firebird2.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
